markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Summon Elemental](/Spells.aspx?ID=1698)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Summon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=520" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 360 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Ayrzul](/Deities.aspx?ID=687), [Hshurha](/Deities.aspx?ID=689), [Kelizandri](/Deities.aspx?ID=690), [Laudinmio](/Deities.aspx?ID=691), [Rivethun](/Deities.aspx?ID=388), [Shumunue](/Deities.aspx?ID=695), [Ymeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=697)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You summon a creature that has the [elemental](/Traits.aspx?ID=57) trait and whose level is 1 or lower to fight for you.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** Level 2.

**Heightened (4th)** Level 3.

**Heightened (5th)** Level 5.

**Heightened (6th)** Level 7.

**Heightened (7th)** Level 9.

**Heightened (8th)** Level 11.

**Heightened (9th)** Level 13.

**Heightened (10th)** Level 15.

 <%SUMMON#57%1%>
name: Summon Elemental

</row>

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

---

<summary>
Conjure an elemental to fight on your behalf.
</summary>
